title: 3 Easy Ways to Download TikTok Audio Sounds as MP3

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. This looks like a multi-colored music note with a black background. TikTok is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . You can also use the desktop website .

steps.title: Copy the TikTok video link.
steps.content: Copy the TikTok video link. When you find a video you want to save, tap or click the Share icon. This looks like a right-point arrow. Tap or click Copy link . This will be below a chain icon. The TikTok video link will be copied to your device's clipboard.

steps.title: Go to the QLoad website in your mobile or web browser.
steps.content: Go to the QLoad website in your mobile or web browser. QLoad can also be used to download TikTok videos without the watermark.

steps.title: Paste your link into the field.
steps.content: Paste your link into the field. To paste on mobile, tap or long-tap on the field. Tap Paste . On desktop, right-click and click Paste . You can also use CTRL + V (Windows) or Command + V (Mac).

steps.title: Tap or click Process.
steps.content: Tap or click Process . On mobile, this is the blue button below the paste field. On desktop, this is the blue button to the right of the field. You may need to choose a save location. On desktop, consider saving to your desktop for quick access. On Android, select a save folder. For iOS, your files will be saved in the Files app. Your video will begin downloading.

steps.title: Find your file.
steps.content: Find your file. Locate the file on your desktop, Android folder, or iOS Files app. Tap or double-click the file to play it.

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. This looks like a multi-colored music note with a black background. TikTok is available for iOS, Android, and desktop.

steps.title: Find a video.
steps.content: Find a video. By default, your For You page will open. Swipe up to view new videos until you find one you want to save. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the music icon at the bottom.
steps.content: Tap the music icon at the bottom. This will have the sound title next to a music note. You'll be taken to the sound page.

steps.title: Tap Add to Favorites.
steps.content: Tap Add to Favorites . The sound will be added to your Favorites. To find the sound, tap Profile at the bottom right of the home page. Tap the Favorites icon, which looks like a bookmark. Tap Sounds . Play a sound by tapping it. If you want to use the sound for your own TikTok video, tap Use this sound . You can also find and organize favorited videos .

steps.title: Open the TikTok app.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app. This looks like a multi-colored music note with a black background. TikTok is available for iOS and Android. Make sure you're logged into your account. If needed, you can recover your account or create a new one . This method will only work using the mobile app. The creator of the TikTok must also allow downloads. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Find a video.
steps.content: Find a video. By default, your For You will open. Swipe up to view new videos until you find one you want to save. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the "Share" icon.
steps.content: Tap the "Share" icon. This is the right-pointing arrow below the bookmark icon. [4] X Research source A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Save video.
steps.content: Tap Save video . This can be found in the bottom row of icons, between Not interested and Turn off captions . [5] X Research source Your video will begin downloading If you do not see this option, the creator does not allow downloads for their video.

steps.title: Locate your video.
steps.content: Locate your video. The saved video can be found in your Camera Roll (iOS) or Gallery (Android).
